name: Civitas Resources, Inc.
description: Civitas Resources, Inc. is a leading independent oil and natural gas exploration and production company based in the United States. Founded in 2021, Civitas focuses primarily on the development of its assets in the Denver-Julesburg Basin (DJ Basin) of Colorado, leveraging advanced technologies and best practices to maximize resource recovery while minimizing environmental impact. The company is committed to sustainable energy practices and aims to provide energy responsibly through innovative production techniques and a strong emphasis on community engagement. Civitas operates with a vision to be a premier operator in the energy sector, prioritizing operational excellence, safety, and environmental stewardship. With a diverse portfolio of assets and a skilled team, Civitas aims to deliver value to its shareholders while contributing positively to the communities in which it operates. The company is actively involved in reducing greenhouse gas emissions and is exploring renewable energy solutions as part of its long-term strategy to adapt to the evolving energy landscape.
